nodes.text: Star Wars: Beware the Dark Side
Star Wars: Beware the Dark Side is a 48-page Level 4 DK Readers book written by Simon Beecroft that was written for proficient readers.

Find out all about the dark side and the Sith who wield power over it. Learn about evil Darth Sidious, Darth Maul and, of course, Darth Vader. Discover how the conflict began between the Jedi and the Sith. Beware the Dark Side has all the Dark Side details you could want to know!.
The section "Rebel Victory" misidentifies the Ewoks homeworld as the planet Endor (planet) instead of the moon Endor. The book also says that spider droids carry missiles.
